backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor types for songs, profiles, verification, blog posts, community messages, and related inputs with numerous imports for storage, access control, migration, and external services.
backend/migration.mo: Implements migration logic converting old actor state structures to a new state format while preserving stored maps and configuration fields.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for recent build‑fix and redeploy tasks, referencing affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and their behaviors.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documentation explaining the root cause of deployment failures and detailing configuration fixes, file additions, and verification steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and applying global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint containing root div and script tag loading the frontend application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s router, query client, theme, and authentication-driven content flow, including loading states and profile/artist setup logic.
frontend/src/components/AdminAnnouncemen: Provides an admin UI to view, edit, and save a global announcement displayed to all users.
frontend/src/components/AdminArtistManag: Displays searchable artist profiles with badge status and allows admins to open an edit dialog for each artist.
frontend/src/components/AdminBlogManagem: Enables admins to create, edit, publish, and delete blog posts with optional media uploads.
frontend/src/components/AdminEditArtistD: Dialog for admins to edit an artist’s profile details and profile photo with upload progress handling.
frontend/src/components/AdminEditSubmiss: Dialog for admins to edit song submission metadata and replace artwork or audio files with upload tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminFeeManageme: UI for viewing and updating distribution and annual maintenance fees, including input fields and save actions tied to query hooks.
frontend/src/components/AdminProfileEdit: Controls whether users can edit artist profiles, with a toggle synced to backend state and explanatory UI.
frontend/src/components/AdminStats.tsx: Displays submission statistics by status, computing totals and percentages using fetched submission data.
frontend/src/components/AdminSubmissions: Admin interface for viewing, moderating, editing, commenting, and downloading assets for all song submissions.
frontend/src/components/AdminTeamManagem: Manages team invite codes, allowing generation, viewing unused codes, and copying invite links.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserRoleMan: Manages user roles, enabling upgrades to team members, downgrades, user deletion, and searching through user profiles.
frontend/src/components/AdminVerificatio: Admin interface for viewing verification requests, updating statuses, and extending badge expiry with filtering and badge-validity logic.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementPopu: Displays an announcement popup when a new message is fetched, using sessionStorage to avoid repeated showing.
Form for creating or editing an artist profile, including photo upload, social links, and validation with mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/DashboardPublish: Loads and displays published blog posts with media preview, timestamps, and fallback states for loading or empty lists.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright text and a support email link.
frontend/src/components/GreenBadge.tsx: Renders a green badge image with configurable size and a tooltip labeled 'Artist'.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main site header handling authentication, navigation, theme toggling, and user display including badges and roles.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/SongSubmissionFo: Form component for submitting songs, handling file uploads, metadata inputs, fees, and final submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/StripeConfigurat: Empty file placeholder for a Stripe configuration modal.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionSect: Empty file placeholder for a subscription UI section.
frontend/src/components/UserEditSubmissi: Dialog allowing users to edit song submissions, including metadata and optional artwork/audio reuploads.
frontend/src/components/UserSubmissionsL: Displays a list of user song submissions with status badges and edit options, loading user data via queries.
frontend/src/components/VerificationBene: Popup shown to unverified users explaining verification benefits and linking to the subscription page.
frontend/src/components/VerificationProm: Empty file placeholder for a verification promotion popup.
frontend/src/components/VerifiedBadge.ts: Renders a verified badge icon with a tooltip and size options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout helpers, and persistent identity handling via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user, artist, blog, and other platform data with mutation support and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark mode CSS variables and applying global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up QueryClientProvider, and wraps the app with InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard UI with tabbed navigation for managing submissions, artists, verification, roles, fees, announcements, blog, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Displays published blog posts with loading state, media previews, dates, and styled content.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page highlighting platform features and offering Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentCancel.tsx: Empty placeholder page for payment cancellation.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Empty placeholder page for payment success.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDashboard.tsx: Team member dashboard allowing limited review of submissions and viewing of artist profiles through tabbed sections.
frontend/src/pages/ThankYouPage.tsx: Thank-you screen confirming song submission and offering navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboard.tsx: Dashboard page managing artist profile state, music submissions, verification flow, and navigation with multiple UI components and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationSubscript: Displays verification subscription details, handles verification application, and shows status-based UI states.
Utility to fetch bytes from an ExternalBlob and trigger a browser download using a generated object URL.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, container settings, animations, and registering plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking state, issues, and required features related to fixing deployment and redeploying the app.
